ygData.subject: Stop song
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone had any luck at all getting the /stopsong command to work? I was fighting in Unrest last night (note to self, never ever go there again!) and
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone had any luck at all getting the /stopsong command to work?
I was fighting in Unrest last night (note to self, never ever go there
again!) and managed to get my song stuck a number of different times
(sigh). And of course my party is asking for the healing song in down
time, and I would have loved to. Except I'm stuck playing binding and
daren't move in case I bring the whole house down on us!

So, nothing I could think of doing would stop the silly song from
playing. Tried /stopsong, no luck. I hope I just had the syntax
wrong please! But I even tried .... sitting, ducking, reading my
songbook, even went so far as unmemming a song and re-memming it, but
no luck. Didn't want to zone for fear of having a train behind me all
nodding!

Please tell me I'm not alone in this! And is there any way of
actually correcting it apart from getting stunned, or how about what
causes the song to get stuck and I'll try to avoid it again!

<grumble, mumble, grumble>

--
Saldara, High Elf Wizard (29 retired)
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (20)
Mith Marr server
